questions.question: Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi?
answers: Nayikunze kandi yari ngira kamaro
Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe n'iyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

questions.question: Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi?
answers: Gukorera mu runani rwiza
Kugenzura ibishobisho vyawe
kwubaka ubwonko bwawe

questions.question: Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure kwiga gukorera mu mugwi, kwumviriza no guhanahana ivyiyumviro n'abandi
Gufasha abanyeshure kumenya ibishobisho vyabo no kwitekanya
Gufasha abanyeshure gutahura ibitera amatati mu kubaza ibibazo

questions.question: Ni ibiki wobwiriza abanyeshure gukora muri kano gakorwa?
answers: Kudadaza umubiri wabo wose incuro cumi
Kudadaza wongera worosha igihimba kimwe kimwe cose uhereye ku mano ugashitsa ku mutwe
Guhemera imbere n'inyuma ningoga na ningoga amaso yugaye

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa guhumiriza amaso yanje mu gihe ndiko ndarongora aka gakorwa
Notegerezwa kureka abanyeshure bagakora ico arico cose biyumvamwo gukora muri kano gakorwa ku buryo batabuza umutekano abandi banyeshure
Notewgerezwa guha amahirwe abanyeshure bahisemwo kuvyitabira

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa guhata abanyeshure kwishura no gusabikanya n'abandi uko biyumva naho batoba badugize urutoke ngo basabikanye n'abandi
Notegerezwa gusaba abanyeshure bose kuvyitabira naho batoba babishaka
Notegerezwa gusigurira neza abanyershure inyungu z'aka gakorwa

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu utotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Sinotegerezwa kubatera intege zo kubandanya bahema bashitsa
Sinoterezwa kureka abanyeshure ngo bagumye impwemu zabo mu gihe c'inyigisho yo kudadaza igihimba c'umubiri
Sinotegerezwa gutera intege mu rupfasoni abanyeshure zo kuvyitabira

questions.question: Ni ibiki umunyeshure yoshobora kuvuga mu mwanya wo kurongora ikiganiro c'aka gakorwa?
answers: Nasanze ikintu rusangi ku bagenzi banje b'ishure nka bose
Umuntu wese ni ngirakamaro mu murwi kandi abantu bose bategerezwa kubamwo
Mu gihe dufise ibibazo vyo kudasinzira twoshobora kwimenyereza kudadaza twongera tworosha imitsi yacu mu gutekanya imibiri yacu n'ubwenge bwacu

questions.question: Aka gakorwa katwigisha kuzirikana iki?
answers: kuba mwiza mukugiriranira imigenderanire n'abandi
Gutahura ibiriko biraba muri wewe n'i ruhande yawe
C Kurondera izindi nzira nshasha kandi zisiguritse mu gutorera umuti ingorane
